extendedInfo.description: Check out Experience Project's first official Android App! Browse the top stories, experiences, questions and answers, and secret confessions of the day. Works offline, so you can take them with you while on a train or plane. We'll be upgrading the app regularly, please let us know what you'd like to see by emailing us at support@experienceproject.com5 million people a month use Experience Project to share their life stories, and connect with people who share their experiences. They post questions and answer, confessions, dreams-- over 40,000 a day. This app lets you see the stories our members voted the most interesting of the day.

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: So I figured out how to log in... But when I leave the app, I have to log in again. That\'s a pain. Needs more of a Facebook set up. And super slow! Lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Yeah you view a few things but the app lacks a lot of key features in a profile website app. Some day you can log in to your account which is kinda true, but really all it does is open an integrated browser so the actual app only shows popular stories. I would suggest just using the mobile site, in the end you will be using it anyways. I will change my rating even it opens up basic profile features.
reviews.author: Jacob Derington

reviews.title: It\'s just a reader, guys
reviews.comment: And yes, you CAN log in. Click on a link to read the rest of the story & you can log in and even do things with your profile. Be smarter than the app.  PS-ALL Confessions I post say they are sex confessions. I specifically marked something different. I\'ve never marked \"sex confessions.\" PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE fix. So awkward.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this!! Amazed by the stories I\'m reading.
reviews.comment: Love the stories and confessions I\'m seeing. They\'re fresh, powerful and sometimes funny. Can\'t help but check to see what people are confessing throughout the day.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good Idea But...
reviews.comment: I really like the idea for this app, but it needs to let me login and search. Also uploading stories would be nice.   Please update this app. Having a better app will expand your readership. It\'s a good idea poorly executed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pointless
reviews.comment: Don\'t understand the point of the app if I can\'t login to see my own groups/conversations.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It works fine, no complaints......
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love the app its perfect for s3 and is alittle slow but overall is great and stays signed in and for those of u who dont know how to sign in go to confessions and press the link given and then when ur about to sign in press the stay signed in button to stay signed in\tIts perfect
reviews.author: Tyler Latorre

reviews.comment: This is terrible. I can\'t login to my account, can\'t post... This is nothing but a fancy RSS reader.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please update!
reviews.comment: I used to go on this brilliant website all the time on my laptop but now it\'s broken and I use my phone more.  A working app of this site would be amazing!  However their are tons of work that needs doing :/ I hope you improve on it very soon
reviews.author: merrick graham

reviews.title: Limited!
reviews.comment: When it says reader app that\'s what it means! You can not choose a category ONLY TOP STORIES! No login or anything! Almost useless App! Doesn\'t even deserve 1 star! Don\'t be fooled by those fake 5 star reviews!
reviews.author: Joey Murray

reviews.title: Like
reviews.comment: I like but I wish it was your profile on a mobile user friendly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App is ok but
reviews.comment: Very plain and not user friendly
reviews.author: Sam kelly

reviews.comment: I like it! Fun to keep up with the latest stories. The latest releases have made this app a lot more useful-- good job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Limited
reviews.comment: It would be nice to be able to login and look all over the instead of the stories the decides for us to read...very boring that way.
reviews.author: Jodie Toney

reviews.title: N, for needs improvement.
reviews.comment: Would love to have EP as an app to rant, rather than spying on what others have posted. Glad to see they officially tried. Rating will go up in relation to app improvement. Ultra basic for checking on what posts are most popular. That\'s all, though.
reviews.author: Yopu Eelin

reviews.comment: Give us more to do like the website does. Let us log in, let us share on the go, let us have our groups on the go. I could read the stories online!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more!
reviews.comment: Can\'t log in, can\'t post, not that great. Uninstall till this gets fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok...
reviews.comment: Its ok...just let others be able to login to their account to post their blogs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not enough
reviews.comment: Should have profile and log in capabilities like the facebook app....boring without!
reviews.author: A Google User
